jobDescriptions: Fixed bugs and made improvements to the company's website written in Angular for a smoother and more intuitive user experience.
Updated all unit tests on the backend to have 100% coverage, ensuring tests were written for functions before they are completed.
Migrated  all backend Python code to Python 3 before Python 2 lost support, and learned the value of well documented code for future developers.
Used Javascript, Node, Vue, PostgreSQL, d3js, and Apollo GraphQL to maintain and build various partner websites and learned the value of modularization.
Created a d3 tree graph for viewing sales under a sales team, complete with sales stats for each individual team member, and the teams under those members as well.
Developed strong interpersonal skills and learned to balance priorities working with our development team and multiple partner companies leaders.
Implemented tests with production pipeline run through Concourse and Docker allowing all changes made the the project to instantly be tested before merging to master.
Tightened security around access to the database.
